question_details.resolution_criteria: This question resolves as **Yes** if the total number of expulsions or removals [reported](https://www.ice.gov/spotlight/statistics) by U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) for FY 2025 is at least double the number shown for FY 2024 at the time.
